name: project-2
description: ------------------------------------------- ICEBOX - User Stories ------------------------------------------ "As a user, I should be able to post photos" "as a user, i should be able to make an updated status" "as a user, i should be able to like other posts" "as a user, i should have a user profile" "as a user, i should be able to browse photos" "i will be able to use a nav bar for all pages" "as a user, i should be able to create albums of photos"
